title: Pit-Hag

fields.name: Abilities:

fields.value:
- Only the target's original faction and goal will be kept.
- You canâ€™t create duplicate roles. If the role is already in play, nothing happens.
- You can permanently consume the necronomicon to switch yourself to another faction.

desc:
Post 4568
*"Round about the cauldron go; In the poison'd entrails throw; Toad, that under cold stone; Days and nights has thirty-one; Sweated venom sleeping got; Boil thou first in the charmed pot."*
